DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this randomized trial is to evaluate the effect of providing full prescription drug coverage (i.e. no co-pays, co-insurance or deductibles) for statins, beta-blockers, angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors and angiotensin II receptor blockers to patients recently discharged from hospital after acute myocardial infarction.
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Evaluation of First-dollar Coverage for Post-MI Secondary Preventive Therapies
